series_title: Supersedes 158-29 dated May, 1982 VRS Trust Fund - Investment Portfolios Accounting Records -

VRS Trust Fund - Investment Portfolios Accounting Records – Microfiche Copies Mellon Trust, VRS master custodian, maintains VRS' books and records and provides monthly accounting statements in three mediums. Theses statements include, consolidated reports (display transactions for the Trust Fund as a whole, NA 100-balance sheet and NC 100-statement of changes in net assets), investment managers' reports (display transactions, NA 100-balance sheet and NC 100-statement of changes in net assets for each account), Old Style assets (holdings report) and general ledger (for the Trust Fund as whole).
retention_statement: Transfer to the Media Vault, Library of Virginia for permanent storage.

series_description: VRS Trust Fund - Investment Managers' Files — Paper Copies Correspondences (capital call letters and distribution notices), quarterly Financial statements/partner's capital statement, annual financial Statements, quarterly managers' account reconciliations, Miscellaneous correspondences (fund/asset transfers, rebalance entries, New account set up letter and form, misc. fees, misc. expenses), legal fees and Management/performance fees (separate binders).
retention_statement: Retain for 7 years after end of FY, then destroy.
